problem_text_cn: 如图,已知⊙C的半径为3,圆外一点O满足OC=5,点P为⊙C上一动点,经过点O的直线l上有两点A、B,且OA=OB,∠APB=90°,l不经过点C,则AB的最小值()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the radius of ⊙C is N_0, a point O outside the circle satisfies OC = N_1, point P is the moving point on ⊙C, and there are two points A and B on the straight line l passing through point O, and OA = OB, ∠ APB = N_2, l does not pass through point C, then the minimum value of AB ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OP,PC,OC,∵OP≥OC-PC=2,∴当点O,P,C三点共线时,OP最小,最小值为2,∵OA=OB,∠APB=90°,∴AB=2OP,当O,P,C三点共线时,AB有最小值为2OP=4,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了几何问题的最值,掌握三角形两边和大于第三边,两边差小于第三边,得到点O,P,C三点共线时,OP最短是解题的关键．
